summary: Diff shows a new V26-themed implementation starting in `frontend/src/AppV1.jsx` (Quantum DATA + `SingularityLoader` long-press entry mechanics). However, due to truncation and lack of evidence for key sections, several V26 requirements cannot be verified from the provided diff summary. Two non-requested metadata/documentation files were also modified.

missing_requirements.requirement: Completely overwrite `frontend/src/AppV1.jsx` with the exact V26 “QUANTUM REALITY” code provided by the user, and boot through `frontend/src/App.tsx` thin wrapper rendering `AppV1`.
missing_requirements.reason: The diff for `AppV1.jsx` is truncated and does not allow verification that the file was replaced in full with the *exact* user-provided V26 code, nor does it show any evidence about `frontend/src/App.tsx` being unchanged/thin in this change set.
evidence: frontend-file-summaries.txt (only a description of App.tsx, not an actual diff of App.tsx)

missing_requirements.requirement: Ensure the project compiles/runs after the overwrite with only minimal mechanical fixes; all referenced symbols resolve; do not change immutable entry files; `App.tsx` remains a thin wrapper rendering `AppV1`.
missing_requirements.reason: No build/CI output is provided, `AppV1.jsx` is truncated (cannot confirm all symbols/imports resolve across the whole file), and there is no direct diff evidence confirming immutable entry files were not modified or that `App.tsx` remains unchanged.
evidence: frontend-file-summaries.txt (not authoritative for compilation status or immutable-file changes)

missing_requirements.requirement: Singularity Entry: black entry screen with pulsing orb requiring sustained press (mouse/touch), release resets progress to 0, and a clear aspiration/pull-in transition when entry completes.
missing_requirements.reason: Hold-to-charge and release-to-reset behavior is evidenced, but the diff is truncated before showing the full orb UI and any explicit aspiration/pull-in transition implementation beyond a basic opacity/scale change.
evidence: frontend/src/AppV1.jsx (shows `SingularityLoader` with `onMouseDown`/`onMouseUp`/`onTouchStart`/`onTouchEnd`, `setProgress(0)` on stop; transition class `opacity-0 scale-95` when entering; remainder truncated)

missing_requirements.requirement: Hyper-Reality Feed: full-screen salon windows, spring-like scrolling transitions (Framer Motion spring config), and subtle scroll-tied image zoom.
missing_requirements.reason: No feed implementation is visible in the truncated `AppV1.jsx` excerpt; there is no evidence of Framer Motion usage or scroll-tied image zoom behavior in the provided snippet.
evidence: frontend/src/AppV1.jsx (only DATA + SingularityLoader portion shown; feed portion not visible)

missing_requirements.requirement: HUD overlays: frosted-glass panels with hover reaction on desktop while remaining usable on touch.
missing_requirements.reason: No HUD overlay/panel implementation is visible in the provided truncated excerpt.
evidence: frontend/src/AppV1.jsx (truncated before any HUD panels are shown)

missing_requirements.requirement: Architect Mode: cyber-futuristic creator UI with real-time revenue simulation, Setup↔Preview “Dimension” switch, and publishing injects new salon into in-memory list.
missing_requirements.reason: No creator/architect mode code is visible in the provided truncated excerpt; cannot verify revenue simulator, dimension toggle, or in-memory injection behavior.

hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest only asks for V26 UI overwrite and minimal mechanical fixes; it does not request updating this summary file.

hallucinated_features.description: Updated `project_state.json` with a new V26 summary and a long list of existing features/REQs unrelated to the requested V26-only local-state UI work.
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest does not mention changing `project_state.json`.
